Pattern Sample: Buttons

btn-subtle <button class="button--subtle">Button</button> <button class="button--subtle" type="submit">Submit Button</button> <a href="#" class="button button--subtle">Link button</a></button> <input class="button--subtle" type="button" value="Input button"></input> <input class="button--subtle" type="submit" value="Input submit button"></input>
Link button
btn-small <button class="button--large">Button</button> <button type="submit" class="button--large">Submit Button</button> <a href="#" class="button button--large">Link button</a></button> <input class="button--large" type="button" value="Input button"></input> <input class="button--large" type="submit" value="Input submit button"></input>
Link button
btn-large <button class="button--large">Button</button> <button type="submit" class="button--large">Submit Button</button> <a href="#" class="button button--large">Link button</a></button> <input type="button" class="button--large" value="Input button"></input> <input type="submit" class="button--large" value="Input submit button"></input>
Link button
btn-disabled <button disabled>Button</button> <button type="submit" disabled>Submit Button</button> <a href="#" class="button button--disabled">Link button</a> <input type="button" value="Input button" disabled></input> <input type="submit" value="Input submit button" disabled></input>
Link button
btn-default <button>Button</button> <button type="submit">Submit Button</button> <a href="#" class="button">Link button</a></button> <input type="button" value="Input button"></input> <input type="submit" value="Input submit button"></input>
Link button
btn-alt <button class="button--alt">Button</button> <button class="button--alt" type="submit" >Submit Button</button> <a href="#" class="button button--alt">Link button</a></button> <input class="button--alt" type="button" value="Input button"></input> <input class="button--alt" type="submit" value="Input submit button"></input>
